interfaces.label: ExecutableTool
description: Onechat tool, as exposed by the onechat tool registry.

children.label: schema
description: Tool's input schema, defined as a zod schema.

children.label: execute
description: Run handler that can be used to execute the tool.

children.label: params
signature: | undefined; toolParams: TParams; defaultConnectorId?: string | undefined; }

interfaces.label: ModelProvider
description: Provider, allowing to select various models depending on the needs.

children.label: getDefaultModel
description:
Returns the default model to be used for LLM tasks.

Will use Elasticsearch LLMs by default if present, otherwise will pick
the first GenAI compatible connector.

children.label: getModel
description:
Returns a model using the given connectorId.

Will throw if connector doesn't exist, user has no access, or connector
is not a GenAI connector.

interfaces.label: OnechatRunEventMeta
description: Base set of meta for all onechat run events.

children.label: runId
description: Current runId

children.label: stack
description: Execution stack

interfaces.label: RegisteredTool
description: Onechat tool, as registered by built-in tool providers.

children.label: schema
description: Tool's input schema, defined as a zod schema.

children.label: handler
description: Handler to call to execute the tool.

children.label: meta
description: Optional set of metadata for this tool.

interfaces.label: RunContext
description:
Context bound to a run execution.
Contains metadata associated with the run's current state.
Will be attached to errors thrown during a run.

children.label: runId
description: The run identifier, which can be used for tracing

children.label: stack
description: The current execution stack

children.label: event
signature: <string, Record<string, any>, Record<string, any>>, "meta"> & { meta?: Record<string, any> | undefined; }

interfaces.label: Runner
description: Public onechat runner.

children.label: runTool
description: Execute a tool.

interfaces.label: RunToolParams
description: Params for {@link RunToolFn}

children.label: toolId
description: ID of the tool to call.

children.label: toolParams
description: Parameters to call the tool with.

children.label: onEvent
description: Optional event handler.

children.label: request
description: The request that initiated that run.

children.label: defaultConnectorId
description:
Optional genAI connector id to use as default.
If unspecified, will use internal logic to use the default connector
(EIS if there, otherwise openAI, otherwise any GenAI)

interfaces.label: RunToolReturn
description:
Return type for tool invocation APIs.

Wrapping the plain result to allow extending the shape later without
introducing breaking changes.

children.label: result
description: The result value as returned by the tool.

interfaces.label: ScopedModel
description:
Represents a model that can be used within the onechat framework (e.g. tools).

It exposes different interfaces to models.

children.label: chatModel
description: langchain chat model.

children.label: inferenceClient
description: Inference client.

interfaces.label: ScopedRunner
description:
Represents a runner, which is the entry point to execute all onechat primitives,
such as tools or agents.

This version is pre-scoped to a given request, meaning APIs don't need to be passed
down a request object.

children.label: runTool
description: Execute a tool.

interfaces.label: ToolHandlerContext
description:
Scoped context which can be used during tool execution to access
a panel of built-in services, such as a pre-scoped elasticsearch client.

children.label: request
description:
The request that was provided when initiating that tool execution.
Can be used to create scoped services not directly exposed by this context.

children.label: esClient
description:
A cluster client scoped to the current user.
Can be used to access ES on behalf of either the current user or the system user.

children.label: modelProvider
description:
Inference model provider scoped to the current user.
Can be used to access the inference APIs or chatModel.

children.label: runner
description:
Onechat runner scoped to the current execution.
Can be used to run other workchat primitive as part of the tool execution.

children.label: events
description: Event emitter that can be used to emits custom events

interfaces.label: ToolProvider
description: Common interface shared across all tool providers.

children.label: has
description: Check if a tool is available in the provider

children.label: get
description:
Retrieve a tool based on its identifier.
If not found, will throw a toolNotFound error.
signature: <Zod.ZodObject<any, Zod.UnknownKeysParam, Zod.ZodTypeAny, { [x: string]: any; }, { [x: string]: any; }>, unknown>>

children.label: list
description: List all tools based on the provided filters
signature: <Zod.ZodObject<any, Zod.UnknownKeysParam, Zod.ZodTypeAny, { [x: string]: any; }, { [x: string]: any; }>, unknown>[]>

interfaces.label: ToolProviderGetOptions
description: Options for {@link ToolProvider.get}

interfaces.label: ToolProviderHasOptions
description: Options for {@link ToolProvider.has}

interfaces.label: ToolProviderListOptions
description: Options for {@link ToolProvider.list}

misc.label: ExecutableToolHandlerFn
description: Execution handler for {@link ExecutableTool}

children.label: params
signature: | undefined; toolParams: TParams; defaultConnectorId?: string | undefined; }

misc.label: ExecutableToolHandlerParams
description: Param type for {@link ExecutableToolHandlerFn}
signature: | undefined; toolParams: TParams; defaultConnectorId?: string | undefined; }

misc.label: InternalRunEvent
description: Internal-facing events, as emitted by tool or agent owners.

misc.label: OnechatRunEvent
description: Public-facing events, as received by the API consumer.

misc.label: RunContextStackEntry
description:
Represents an element in the run context's stack.
Used to follow nested / chained execution.

misc.label: RunEventEmitterFn
description: Event emitter function, exposed from tool or agent runnable context.

children.label: event
signature: <string, Record<string, any>, Record<string, any>>, "meta"> & { meta?: Record<string, any> | undefined; }

misc.label: RunEventHandlerFn
description: Event handler function to listen to run events during execution of tools, agents or other onechat primitives.

misc.label: RunToolFn
description: Public onechat API to execute a tools.

misc.label: ScopedRunnerRunToolsParams
description: Params for {@link ScopedRunner.runTool}

misc.label: ScopedRunToolFn
description: Public onechat API to execute a tools.

misc.label: ToolHandlerFn
description: Tool handler function for {@link RegisteredTool} handlers.
